mapper.update: update t_task set date_task = #{dateTask}, `name_task` = #{nameTask},keywords = #{keywords},spec = #{spec},require = #{require}, time_doing = #{timeDoing}, buy_num = #{buyNum}, price = #{price}, update_time = #{updateTime} WHERE id = #{id}
